original_title: Emerson, Lake & Palmer - Live at the Royal Albert Hall
overview: Live at the Royal Albert Hall is a live album by Emerson, Lake & Palmer. It was recorded at a show at the Royal Albert Hall during the Black Moon tour in October 1992. Highlights of the album include a 9 minute outfreakage of "Tarkus", the song "Black Moon", and "Finale", which is a three song medley.
title: Emerson, Lake & Palmer - Live at the Royal Albert Hall
